page.title: 11CLUBS AND ASSOCIATIONS
page.content: Clubs - Service to Godshill Community. Serving the very young are a Mother and Baby Group, and a flourishing pre-school Playgroup, while all sections of the community are helped by such elected groups as the Parish Council, Parochial Church Council, Village Hall Committee, School Governors and Parent Teacher Association. The Royal British Legion, whose members are all connected with H.M. Armed Forces, has both social and charitable functions. The villagers have bought, and maintain by voluntary effort, a community mini-bus, available on hire to all, which runs regularly twice a week to and from Newport when it is used mainly by the elderly. Residents have special reason to be pleased with themselves in 1985 as the village won the title "Isle of Wight Best Kept Village".
